price: 6. Yalla kinni sin inaanih maxaxal isih elle faxa innal sin gintaah weeloola Siinih taceem, kaak-sa cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayan, Yalli mayso-li Naggaara.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُصَوِّرُكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ كَيۡفَ يَشَآءُۚ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yuṣawwirukum fī al-arḥāmi kayfa yashāu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
